forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with rain and snow showers this morning. Partial clearing this afternoon. High 7C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%. Snow accumulations less than 2cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow tapering off this morning. Decreasing cloudiness for the afternoon. High 46F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%. Snow accumulations less than one inch.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies this evening will give way to occasional showers overnight. Low 1C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the evening giving way to a few showers after midnight. Low 36F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Steady light rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High 7C. Winds SW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High near 45F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy. Slight chance of a shower throughout the evening. Low 3C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly cloudy. Slight chance of a shower throughout the evening. Low 38F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. High 7C. Winds S at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. High near 45F. Winds S at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. Low 1C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Low near 35F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early, becoming a steady rain later in the day. High 6C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early, becoming a steady rain later in the day. High 44F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with overcast skies late. Low around 0C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the evening, then cloudy overnight. Low 33F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast. High 7C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. High near 45F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy. Low around 0C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness. Low 32F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with a few showers. High 8C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with a few showers. High 46F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 1C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low around 35F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early becoming less numerous later in the day. High 7C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the morning becoming more intermittent in the afternoon. High around 45F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 2C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 36F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. High 8C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 47F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. Low 2C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. Low 36F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 9C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. High 48F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy in the evening with more clouds for later at night. Low 2C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy early with increasing clouds overnight. Low 36F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 9C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 48F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 3C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. Low 39F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.
